document_data.name: Whitegates
document_data.mainbody:
'''Whitegates''' was a white stone manor located in [[Temple District (Ravens Bluff)|Temple District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]]. The modest home was located on the corner of [[Dragonscale Street]] and [[Moorland Ride]], within the district's [[Swordspoint]] neighborhood.

During the 1300s [[DR]], Whitegates served as the home of [[Obelarth Minstrelwish|"Oldwrinkles" Minstrelwish]], the patriarch of the [[halfling]] [[Minstrelwish]] noble family.
